alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 6:57PM EDT until April 22 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lewis County in central New York... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 657 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lowville, or 21 miles north of Boonville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lowville, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Harrisville, Croghan, Castorland and Belfort. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
